summaries: My name's Peter Laraia, I'm currently working at Thomson Reuters in the Findlaw organization as a Software Engineer, developing web applications and lead intake systems that help connect small to medium sized law firms with prospective clients.

I graduated from the University of Wisconsin - Madison in 2016, majoring in Computer Science. I love learning & playing with new technologies, and find myself particulary drawn to the rapidly evolving space of front-end development. I also enjoy tinkering with raspberry pis: I have a few laying around the house currently, one acting as a vpn to the home network, another as a home media center, and one that I haven't decided what to do with yet (ideas welcome â˜º)
hobbies: I enjoy playing & watching soccer (S.C. Freiburg fan)
I play video games (recently Overwatch & Horizon: Zero Dawn)
My favorite tv shows are Game of Thrones, Daredevil, The Flash, Brooklyn Nine Nine, Friends (The list goes on & on)
I love skiing and have been a PSIA certified ski instructor for over 4 years
